name: Action
description: High-energy scenes, stunts, and physical conflict.

name: Thriller
description: Suspense-driven plots with tension and excitement.

name: Romance
description: Focuses on love stories and emotional relationships.

name: Comedy
description: Humorous content intended to entertain and amuse.

name: Drama
description: Realistic characters dealing with emotional themes.

name: Science Fiction
description: Futuristic settings and speculative scientific elements.

name: Fantasy
description: Magical worlds, mythical creatures, and supernatural powers.

name: Horror
description: Designed to frighten or disturb the audience.

name: Mystery
description: Centers around solving a puzzle or crime.

name: Adventure
description: Exploration and daring experiences in exotic settings.

name: Animation
description: Features created using animated visuals and characters.

name: Crime
description: Focuses on criminal acts, investigations, and justice.

name: Musical
description: Uses song and dance to tell the story.

name: War
description: Set during wartime, exploring military life and conflict.
